properties.credits: Dr. Rosanne Birney, Dr. T.J. McDonald, WIT

title: NoSQL Databases
objectives: Lab work for the NoSQL Databases module

topics.title: CRUD
topics.objectives: In this lab, we will explore the syntax of the MongoDB CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality.

los.title: Create
los.objectives: This lab introduces the CREATE functions in MongoDB.

los.title: Read (find)
los.objectives: In this lab, we will explore the find() statement in MongoDB, including a range of operators used to filter query results.

los.title: Update
los.objectives: This lab examines the methods used for updating documents in MongoDB.

los.title: Delete
los.objectives: In this lab, we examine the MongoDB methods using for deleting documents from a collection.

topics.title: DOM
topics.objectives: In this topic, we will examine Document-Oriented Modelling (DOM).

los.title: Document-Oriented Modelling
los.objectives: These slides introduce the concept of document-oriented modelling.

topics.title: Backup
topics.objectives: This lab will cover the MongoDB functions used to backup and restore data.

los.title: Backup
los.objectives: This lab examines the functions used to backup and restore data in MongoDB.
